property.name: apex.app-param.filesForScanning
property.description: Specify the comma separated files/directories to scan

property.name: apex.app-param.bucketNameForS3Input
property.description: Specify name of the bucket for input S3

property.name: apex.app-param.accessKeyForS3Input
property.description: Specify accessKey for input S3

property.name: apex.app-param.secretKeyForS3Input
property.description: Specify secretKey for input S3

property.name: apex.app-param.regionForS3OrEMR
property.description: Specify region for input S3

property.name: apex.app-param.directoryPathForRedshiftInS3
property.description: Specify directory name for intermediate S3 which writes the redshift module only if the reader mode is READ_FROM_S3

property.name: apex.app-param.bucketNameForRedshiftInS3
property.description: Specify name of the bucket for intermediate S3 which writes the redshift module only if the reader mode is READ_FROM_S3

property.name: apex.app-param.clusterIdForRedshift
property.description: Specify the cluster id for redshift only if the reader mode is READ_FROM_EMR

property.name: apex.app-param.tableNameForRedshift
property.description: Specify the name of the table for redshift database.

property.name: apex.app-param.userNameToConnectRedshift
property.description: Specify the user name to connect redshift database.

property.name: apex.app-param.userPasswordToConnectRedshift
property.description: Specify the password to connect redshift database

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcUrlOfRedshift
property.description: Specify the jdbc url of the cluster.

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcDriverOfRedshift
property.description: Specify the jdbc driver of the Redshift cluster.

property.name: apex.app-param.RedshiftDelimiter
property.description: Specify delimiter for Redshift.

property.name: apex.app-param.RedshiftReaderMode
property.description: Specify reader mode for Redshift. By default, it load files from S3 into Redshift table. If the file is located in EMR, then specify "READ_FROM_EMR" mode

property.name: apex.app-param.csvParserSchema
property.description: Specify schema for CSV Parser.

property.name: apex.app-param.csvFormatterSchema
property.description: Specify schema for CSV Formatter.

property.name: apex.app-param.tupleClassNameForCsvParserOutput
property.description: Specify tuple class name for csv parser output.

property.name: apex.app-param.tupleClassNameForFormatterInput
property.description: Specify tuple class name for formatter input.

property.name: apex.app-param.tupleClassNameForTransformInput
property.description: Specify tuple class name for transform input.

property.name: apex.app-param.tupleClassNameForTransformOutput
property.description: Specify tuple class name for transform output.
